Title: Major Greenwood (1880–1949): the biography
Abstract: © 2016 The Authors. Statistics in Medicine Published by John Wiley & Sons Ltd.Background is provided on the discovery of an unpublished biography of Major Greenwood written by one of his sons. The motivation and preparation for online publication of the biography in Statistics in Medicine are outlined. © 2016 The Authors. Statistics in Medicine Published by John Wiley & Sons Ltd.
